_s3.title: Why Membership?
_s3.description:
Here are just 3 solid reasons.
Just three:
_s3.list1: Prevents everyone from killing private methods.
_s3.list2: All custom content can easily be resold for a profit (to you)
_s3.list3: Helps limits the number of hams/skids/freeloaders.

_s4.title: Free Knowledge.
_s4.list2: To free daily - various live streaming sessions

_story.title: Breakdown
_story.name: L33TSP3AK1337 MEMBERSHIP
_story.page1: Become a master of the digital battlefield. Understand how exploits, methods, configs and more is crafted, analyze real-world malware, uncover hidden tokens to divert traffic from spreaders and malware hosts. Acquire the skills to pinpoint and extract valuable card databases. Prepare to transcend your current capabilities and embark on a journey of unparalleled knowledge acquisition.
_story.page2: Forget the surface-level leaks. We delve into the abyss, procuring clandestine intel directly from the source. No middlemen, no diluted information. Just raw, unfiltered data, yours for the taking.
_story.page3: Join an exclusive community of skilled individuals who operate in the shadows. Share tactics, exchange knowledge, and collaborate on projects that push the boundaries.
_story.page4: Connect with a network of like-minded individuals who share your passion for cybersecurity. Engage in discussions, share knowledge, and collaborate on projects.
_story.page5: Never stop growing. Access a wealth of educational resources, including tutorials, webinars, and challenges, to keep your skills sharp and up-to-date.
_story.page6: The digital landscape is ever-changing. Stay sharp with access to advanced training materials, challenges, and simulations that will test your skills and push you to your limits.
